name: Crisp Ricies
description:
A BRIEF INTRODUCTION TO CRISP RICIES

1. Unwrap your sweet treat. 

2. Hurtle your sweet little ricey body into the mouth of an awaiting patron. 

**This is a very serious game about eating sweet crispy rice snacks. Please take this game very seriously while you play it.**

"shockingly engaging" - Vice Waypoint (wow, Waypoint wrote about this!!! <3) 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CONTROLS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - Movement Controls

Space - Hurtle yourself

Mouse Drag - Unwrap Crispy Treat

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CREDITS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Art made in collaboration with Salazar

Sounds from Freesound.org

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Thanks for eating! 

Crawlspace ~ 2017
